description:
Chihaya appears to have recovered from her bad start, but Megumu will not let her take 
consecutive cards.  As the players spur on their aces, both sides begin to pull together as 
teams.  Which team will prove to be stronger?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In My Dreams, I Creep Closer to You
ゆめのかよひぢ ひとめよくらむ
